mainHero.title: Your Ultimate
mainHero.subtitle: Selling Companion!
mainHero.description: Bye-bye hassle! Welcome to Bi3: the easiest way to sell your used items. Our cutting-edge app connects you with buyers nearby, for a selling experience like never before!

items.title: Fast and Smart Selling
items.description: Bi3 takes the stress out of selling your used items. Don’t wait for days or weeks to get a response. Our intelligent platform enables you to receive bids on your `Dash Zone` in real-time. List your item, and watch the bids roll in!

items.title: Localized Selling with Dash Zone
items.description: When you use Bi3's `Dash Zone`, you tap into a vast network of potential buyers located within a 5-kilometer radius. Connect with your local community, make quick sales, and reduce the need for long-distance transactions.

items.title: Expanding Your Reach with Selling Zone
items.description: Need to sell an item outside your radius? No worries! Bi3's `Selling Zone` lets you promote your items without limitations, giving you the flexibility to reach buyers from all corners.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: We've designed Bi3 with simplicity in mind. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and intuitive experience, making selling your used items a breeze.

items.title: Secure Transactions
items.description: At Bi3, your safety and security are our top priorities. We've implemented robust measures to protect your personal information and ensure secure transactions for a worry-free selling experience.

items.name: Create Your Listing
items.description: Snap a photo, add a brief description, set a price, and list your item in seconds.

items.name: Activate Dash Zone
items.description: For localized selling, activate the `Dash Zone` to connect with buyers within a 5-kilometer radius.

items.name: Receive Real-Time Bids
items.description: Watch as potential buyers submit bids on your item, ensuring you get the best offer.

items.name: Seal the Deal
items.description: Choose the most appealing bid, chat with the buyer, and close the deal easily.

items.name: Explore Selling Zone
items.description: Want to sell beyond your local area? Utilize the `Selling Zone` feature to expand your audience.

items.name: Wait, There's No Step 6!
items.description: Surprise! You've already mastered the art of selling with Bi3. No need for a complicated finale – you've sold your item like a pro! Sit back, relax, and enjoy your well-earned success!
